awoo: Gary, quit it, you're gonna start a howl!
cmd_help:
Available commands:/getmessage: gets a random message.
/help: shows this message.
/start: registers the chat with the bot.
/listdailyreminders lists all current reminders for the chat.
/setdailyreminder 12:34 registers a daily reminder at the 24h time specified.
/stopdailyreminder 12:34 removes a daily reminder at the 24h time specified.
/stop: removes all scheduled reminders for this chat and unregisters this chat.
/update: updates the bot's data from the database.
cmd_start:
Awo0o0o! Harro, welcome to AwooPackBot, I've registered this chat in my database.
Use /help to see a list of commands I respond to.
cmd_set_daily_succcess: I've registered a daily reminder for the time you requested. Use /listdailyreminders to see what reminders are scheduled for this chat.
cmd_stop_daily_success: I've removed the requested daily reminder.
cmd_stop: Are you sure you want to continue? This will remove all scheduled reminders and remove this chat from my database. Use /stopconfirm to continue.
cmd_stop_confirm: I've removed this chat along with all scheduled reminders from my database.
cmd_unknown: Sorry, I don't know that trick.ðŸ¥ºðŸ¦´
cmd_update: I've updated the my database from the Google Sheet.
err_24h_format: This command requires a time specified in 24 hour format.
err_already_exists: A reminder for that time is already set for this chat.
err_cant_find_reminder: I couldn't find a reminder for this chat at that time.
err_cant_schedule_jobs: I had trouble scheduling that reminder. ðŸ¥º I'm sorry, please check the logs for more info.
err_chat_not_in_db: I don't currently have this chat registered in my database.
err_no_reminders: I'm not seeing any scheduled reminders for this chat.
err_stop_not_armed: I can't perform this action until you run /stop first.
